name: Richard Nagy
cookieBanner.title: This website uses cookies
cookieBanner.subTitle: I use cookies (and similar technoligies) to enhance your browsing experience, serve personalized content, and analyze my traffic. By clicking "Accept All", you consent to my use of cookies.
consent.description: Stores that you already interacted with the cookie consent banner.
functionList: Software engineer, technology enthusiast, hobby economist
quote: Any fool can write code that a computer can understand. Good programmers write code that humans can understand.
intro.p1: I'm a profitient software engineer, working as a full-stack web application developer. My mission is to help companies uncage the potential of technology.
intro.p2: I started professional programming as a student at Obuda University. In the third semester I got my first internship position where I started learning web application development. I wrote my thesis on cross-platform mobile application development, then graduated in 2018. Since then I work full time as a software engineer in different roles.
intro.p3: During my career I worked on various projects like e-commerce platform and project management tools mainly using MicrosoftÂ® technologies. I gathered experience in agile methodologies and Test Driven Development as well.
intro.p4: At my leisure I'm happy to learn about the economics, take photos and play video games.
